About me

I am a college student from Haverford College majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Economics. I am also an animal lover who loves dog, cat, and other cute animals. Coding is only a small part of my life. During my free time I like to do workouts in gym, play basketball and badminton with my friends, play guitar (will learn it during Summer 2019!), and play some video games (League of Legends, etc.). Never give up easily. Work hard, play hard, and train hard.
